step.para: In the Task tagging configuration section, complete the following steps:
Select &enable-managed-tags; if you want &ECS; to automatically tag each task with the &ECS; managed tags. For more information, see Tagging Your &ECS; Resources.
For Propagate tags from, select one of the following:

listitem.para: Do not propagate – This option will not propagate any tags.
Task Definitions – This option will propagate the tags specified in the task definition to the task.

note.para: If you specify a tag with the same key in the Tags section, it will override the tag propagated from the task definition.
